an5.150:4.1: “Mendicants, these five things lead to the decline of a mendicant who is temporarily free.
an5.150:4.3: They relish work, talk, and sleep. They don’t guard the sense doors and they eat too much.
an5.150:4.4: These five things lead to the decline of a mendicant who is temporarily free.
an5.150:5.1: These five things don’t lead to the decline of a mendicant who is temporarily free.
an5.150:5.3: They don’t relish work, talk, and sleep. They guard the sense doors and they have moderation in eating.
an5.150:5.4: These five things don’t lead to the decline of a mendicant who is temporarily free.”
